column2: we ordered some seafood and meat. I must say
column3: the grilled squid felt like it was missing something...it needed good squeeze of lemon. However
column4: the ahi tuna with meyer lemon
column7: and tomato was just AMAZING. It had a slightly crunchy exterior with a very juicy and flavorful raw interior..and I must say
column8: I've never been much into olives and capers because they can really overpower a dish
column9: but the combination was perfect. There was a good balance of saltiness and sweetness from the olives/capers and tomato and nothing too overpowering.
